lead_paragraph: Venture capitalists pulled back from making new bets at the end of last year.

headline.print_headline: Venture Funding Slackened in the Last Quarter of 2015
headline.main: Venture Funding Slackened in the Last Quarter of 2015

snippet: Venture capitalists pulled back from making new bets at the end of last year.
abstract: CB Insights reports venture capital funding dropped to $27.3 billion for fourth quarter of 2015, 30 percent less than previous quarter; says $128.7 billion total for all of 2015 is almost as much as years 2013 and 2014 combined.
